title: Introducing: LAYLA
content: 24-year old Londoner, LAYLA, has hit town with her 5-track  Black Mud EP which she released in late April. Her sound is undoubtedly pop, featuring her Florence Welsh-style vocals which are complemented by perfectly timed piano and drum beats. What sets her apart is the dramatic set-up of each individual song, which could easily be imagined as the backdrop to a piece of theatre.  Personal favourite track from the EP is Smokestacks, brilliantly showcasing the drama of her sound.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d09
